turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like four pizzas, large, two of them with chicken barbecue topping and the other two I would like Meat Lovers. And can I have gluten-free crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large gluten free pizzas, 2 chicken bbq and 2 meat lovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to have it delivered.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 50 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
